mapper.select:
SELECT t.after_status value, COUNT( t.after_sale_no ) num FROM ( SELECT oas.after_status, oas.after_sale_no
GROUP BY oas.after_sale_no ) t GROUP BY t.after_status

SELECT oas.after_sale_no, oas.after_type, oas.after_status, oas.refund_price, oas.user_phone, oas.pay_price, oas.freight, oas.apply_time, oas.receiver_name, oas.receiver_phone, oas.receiver_address, GROUP_CONCAT(oasi.order_item_id) orderItemIds
GROUP BY oas.after_sale_no ORDER BY oas.after_sale_no DESC

SELECT oas.after_sale_no, oas.after_type, oas.after_reason, oas.after_explain, oas.refund_price, oas.refund_time, oas.cert_img_json, oas.apply_time, oas.after_status, oas.handler_result_for_refund, oas.handler_remark_for_refund, oas.handler_time_for_refund, oas.handler_result_for_apply, oas.handler_remark_for_apply, oas.handler_time_for_apply, oas.close_time, oas.seller_auto_close_time, oas.buyer_auto_close_time, oas.receiver_name, oas.receiver_phone, oas.receiver_address, oas.return_logistics_code, oas.return_logistics_no, GROUP_CONCAT(oasi.order_item_id) orderItemIds FROM oms_order_after_sale oas JOIN oms_order_after_sale_item oasi ON oas.after_sale_no = oasi.after_sale_no WHERE oas.after_sale_no = #{afterSaleNo}

SELECT oas.after_sale_no, oas.order_no, oi.sku_id, oi.name, oi.num FROM oms_order_after_sale oas JOIN oms_order_after_sale_item oasi ON oas.after_sale_no = oasi.after_sale_no JOIN oms_order_item oi ON oi.order_item_id = oasi.order_item_id WHERE oas.after_sale_no = #{afterSaleNo}

SELECT order_no, MAX( IF( after_status IN ( 1, 3, 5, 8, 9 ) , 1, 0) ) isAfterSale FROM oms_order_after_sale
AND order_no IN
#{orderNo}
GROUP BY order_no

SELECT oas.after_sale_no, oas.after_type, oas.after_status, oas.refund_price, GROUP_CONCAT(oasi.order_item_id) orderItemIds FROM oms_order_after_sale oas JOIN oms_order_after_sale_item oasi ON oas.after_sale_no = oasi.after_sale_no JOIN oms_order_item oi ON oi.order_item_id = oasi.order_item_id WHERE oas.is_deleted = 0
AND ( oas.after_sale_no LIKE CONCAT( #{filter.keyWord} , '%' ) OR oi.name LIKE CONCAT( #{filter.keyWord} , '%' ) )
AND oas.user_id = #{filter.userId}
GROUP BY oas.after_sale_no ORDER BY oas.after_sale_no DESC

SELECT oas.after_sale_no, oas.order_no, oas.after_type, oas.after_status, oas.after_reason, oas.after_explain, oas.refund_price, oas.refund_time, oas.cert_img_json, oas.apply_time, oas.handler_result_for_refund, oas.handler_remark_for_refund, oas.handler_time_for_refund, oas.handler_result_for_apply, oas.handler_remark_for_apply, oas.handler_time_for_apply, oas.close_time, oas.update_time, oas.seller_auto_close_time, oas.buyer_auto_close_time, oas.return_logistics_code, oas.return_logistics_no, GROUP_CONCAT(oasi.order_item_id) orderItemIds FROM oms_order_after_sale oas JOIN oms_order_after_sale_item oasi ON oas.after_sale_no = oasi.after_sale_no WHERE oas.is_deleted = 0 AND oas.after_sale_no = #{afterSaleNo}

SELECT oasi.order_item_id FROM oms_order_after_sale oas JOIN oms_order_after_sale_item oasi ON oas.after_sale_no = oasi.after_sale_no WHERE oas.is_deleted = 0 AND oasi.order_no = #{orderNo} AND oas.after_status IN (1, 3, 5, 8, 9)
